  14. (**************************************************************************)
  15. (* Per function environment for emit - common code for all targets. *)
  16. ‌type label = Linear.label

  18. (* Record calls to caml_call_gc, emitted out of line. *)
  19. ‌type gc_call =
  20.   { gc_lbl: label;                      (* Entry label *)
  21.     gc_return_lbl: label;               (* Where to branch after GC *)
  22.     gc_frame_lbl: label;                (* Label of frame descriptor *)
  23.   }

  25. (* Record calls to caml_ml_array_bound_error.
  26.    In -g mode, we maintain one call to caml_ml_array_bound_error
  27.    per bound check site.  Without -g, we can share a single call. *)

  29. ‌type bound_error_call =
  30.   { bd_lbl: label;                      (* Entry label *)
  31.     bd_frame: label;                    (* Label of frame descriptor *)
  32.   }

  34. (* Pending floating-point literals *)
  35. ‌type float_literal =
  36.   {
  37.     fl : int64;
  38.     lbl : label;
  39.   }

  41. (* Pending large integer literals *)
  42. ‌type int_literal =
  43.   {
  44.     n : nativeint;
  45.     n_lbl : label;
  46.   }

  48. (* Pending offset computations : {lbl; dst; src;} --> lbl: .word dst-(src+N) *)
  49. ‌type offset_computation =
  50.   { lbl : label;
  51.     dst : label;
  52.     src : label;
  53.   }

  55. (* Pending relative references to the global offset table *)
  56. ‌type gotrel_literal =
  57.   { lbl_got : label;
  58.     lbl_pic : label;
  59.   }

  61. (* Pending symbol literals *)
  62. ‌type symbol_literal =
  63.   {
  64.     sym : string;
  65.     lbl : label;
  66.   }

  68. (* Environment for emitting a function *)
  69. ‌type per_function_env = {
  70.   f : Linear.fundecl;
  71.   mutable stack_offset : int;
  72.   mutable call_gc_sites : gc_call list;  (* used in all targets except power *)
  73.   mutable call_gc_label : label;                       (* used only in power *)
  74.   mutable bound_error_sites : bound_error_call list;
  75.                                          (* used in all targets except power *)
  76.   mutable bound_error_call : label option;       (* used in amd64,s390x *)

  78.   (* record jump tables (for PPC64).  In order to reduce the size of the TOC,
  79.      we concatenate all jumptables and emit them at the end of the function. *)
  80.   mutable jumptables_lbl : label option;               (* used only in power *)
  81.   mutable jumptables : label list; (* in reverse order *)

  83.   (* pending literals *)
  84.   mutable float_literals : float_literal list;   (* in all except amd64 *)
  85.   mutable int_literals : int_literal list;             (* used only in s390x *)
  86. }
